title: BGMI
description: BGMI is a competitive battle royale tournament where players form teams and compete for the top spot in a fast-paced, action-packed game. Participants will compete to survive, strategize, and emerge victorious. Emulators and hacks are strictly prohibited to ensure fair play.
registration: Only college students are permitted to participate.
A valid college ID is mandatory.
Participants must wear the registration throughout the day.
Prior registration is mandatory to attend any event/workshops, either online or on-spot.
Re-entry is not allowed, and the fee paid for any event/workshops is non-refundable.
rules: Team Size: Team participation of 4 members.
Event Duration: Will vary based on the time of game completion.
Players are only allowed to enter the match when they are physically present in the given venue.
Participants must own a compatible mobile device, a BGMI account, and use their own accessories.
Emulators and iPads are strictly not allowed.
Participants who use any sort of hack will be disqualified from the tournament.
Minimum 3 players must play the match; otherwise, your team will be disqualified.
Teaming up with the opponents is strictly prohibited. If found, both team members will be disqualified.
Leaking match IDs and passwords may result in direct prohibition for the whole team.
Players are requested to take screenshots of their respective team results after the game for verification purposes.
No abusive language will be tolerated with the hosts nor any other contestants.
